SureTel Hosted VOIP Web App
Google Chrome Extension for Phone Call Flow Controller of SureTel PBX.

Features : 
- Active Call Controller
- Sub Extension Module
- Time Condition Module
- Call Flow Settings
- Auto Queue Login/Logout
- Queue Monitor
- Queue Manager
- Auto Agent Timer in Queue
- Merge Call
- Advanced Transfer Options
